description:
M81 a LRHaGB-color picture from Denmark, Sjaelland area.

A kind of a crowd-imaging picture with few pictures/stacks integrated into one cropped color picture.

Contributers are:
Mr. Ole Berg Nielsen
Eq. used, Scope Celestron 9.25" Edge HD F6.7. Mount CGEM with usage of TDM and Pole Master, no autoguide. Camera Atik 383L+ mono.
Filters LRGB Ha (5 nm) Astrodon.
Exposure details & subs taken 23, 25 & 26 Febr-2018:
L=110x300sec bin1x1
R=47x60sec bin2x2
G=43x60sec bin2x2
B=32x60sec bin2x2
Ha=17x300sec bin2x2

Mr. Bent Munkholm
Eq. used, Scope FSQ 85 F/D5.3. Mount SkyWatcher NEQ6 Pro Skywatcher. Camera SBIG ST-8300M/C.
Exposure details & subs taken 8 and 12 Febr-2018:
L=37x900sec bin1x1
Ha=32x600sec bin1x1
R=14x300sec bin2x2
G=14x300sec bin2x2
B=14x300sec bin2x2

Mr. Niels Haagh
Eq. used, Scope TV NP127is F5.2. Mount TTS-160 Panther. Camera ZWO asi1600MM.
Filters Ha Baader.
Exposure details & subs taken 26 Febr-2018:
Ha=18x600sec bin1x1.

Eq. used: Scope TEC-140 F7. Mount TTS-160 Panther. Camera Canon 1100Da.
Exposure details & subs taken 25 Febr-2018:
25x300sec, ISO1600.

Integration of the individuel contributers calibrated LRGB,Ha,color stacks was done by me,
where I used CCDStack2, RegiStar and Adobe Photoshop CS6 programs/features.

Stack info. available (as 16bit Tiff) if needed/on request.
Kind regards Niels
title: M81 a LRHaGB-color picture
